basic.description: Orthonormal families, Fourier series and convergence. Signal spaces, Fourier transforms, and generalized functions. Solution of boundary value problems, including heat, wave, and potential equations. Applications to mechanical, electrical, and thermal systems.
basic.subject: MATH
basic.title: Mathematical Methods for Engineering and Physics

extra.enrollment_requirement:
Prerequisites     (MATH231 or MATH237) and MATH281.
Exclusion    No more than 1 course from MATH334 ; PHYS312.
